alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:31PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Eureka County through 100 PM PDT... At 1231 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Diamond Valley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond Valley, Eureka Airport and Garden Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
